Hi Nhật Quang,

I hope you're doing well. I wanted to remind you about the project update meeting scheduled for this Friday at 10:00 AM in Conference Room B. We will be discussing the current progress, any challenges faced, and next steps.

Please bring any necessary materials, and let me know if you have specific topics you’d like to cover. If you’re unable to attend, please inform me in advance.

Looking forward to seeing you there!

Best regards,
Alex Tran
Project Manager, Olympia Corp
